7100.name: The Edge Of The Water
7100.description: The pool side is dimly lit up by your light.  You can see absolutely nothing else nearby.  The darkness her seems enormously oppressive here. The air is damp and the rock on which you stand is slippery.  The pool seems too dark to make anything clear.  The pool seems to extend to the east.  The rock can be climbed upwards from here.

7101.name: Under The Mudhole
7101.description: You stand in a small room with a great big opening in the ceiling.  From this opening there is mud dripping down in large lumps.  >YUCK<.  You can smell the foul stench of the slimy sediment as you try not to get covered by the falling sludge.  To the east there is an entryway leading out from here and it seems absolutely impossible to force the muddy descent.

east.description: East.  You see nothing of interest.

7102.name: Under The Dark Pit
7102.description: Nice place you found yourself in.  You stand in the middle of a room with only two exits, up and east.  A tall ladder has been left here so that you can climb up through the pit without the use of a rope.

up.description: Up.  You can't see a thing up there, it is way too dark.

7103.name: A Muddy Bend In The Sewer System
7103.description: You are standing in what looks like a bend in the pipe system of the sewer.  The 'floor' is covered completely by mud!  This includes covering your legs up to your knees as well.  The pipe leads west and south.

south.description: To the south there is less mud than here!  It actually seems to end there! You have a felling it would be nice to have your feet free from mud again.

west.description: You can see a room in which mud drips from the roof onto the floor in  great cakes of sludge.  There doesn't seem to be any exits from that room apart from in you direction.

7104.name: A Junction In The Sewer Pipes
7104.description: You stand in the middle of what looks like a triple junction of pipes going east, west and north.

north.description: You can see a mud area starting in that direction.

east.description: East.  You can't even make out what it might look like, it is just too dark.

west.description: West.  There is a room with a ladder leading up.

7105.name: Down The Old Well
7105.description: You are dangling on the slippery sides of the old well leading down and up.  The only secure point here is the metal bars that are cemented into the sides, the ones that you cling frantically to so that you don't fall.  Who knows how deep this well is?  The bars lead down and up and nowhere else.

up.description: There is a slight, dim light from above, or maybe it is just your imagination. Anyway it SEEMS darker down here than up there, if that is possible.

7106.name: The Northwestern Corner Of The Ledge
7106.description: You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe, solid ledge under your feet.  The ledge continues to the east but not back south.  It seems that the ledge is too narrow to turn on so you'll have to continue forward.

down.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

7107.name: The Narrow Ledge
7107.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads into a corner and turns eastward.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but  darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling an utterly unknown distance.

south.description: South.  The ledge leads further south into utter darkness.

7108.name: The Narrow Ledge
7108.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

south.description: The ledge continues further south into darkness.

7109.name: The Narrow Ledge
7109.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

south.description: The ledge continues south into darkness.

7110.name: The Narrow Ledge
7110.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

south.description: South.  You can just make out the south-western corner of this ledge.

7111.name: The Southwestern Corner Of The Ledge
7111.description: This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the north of here.  The ledge seems to lead around some sort of Abyss of total darkness.  The ledge seems to have an odd-looking edge here.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You see a broad ledge leading eastward.

south.description: South of here is the exit from the ledge.

down.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

7112.name: An Odd Intersection
7112.description: You stand in a rather odd intersection of pipes.  The pipes actually don't resemble pipes anymore.  They look more like a real stone tunnel, or a passageway hewn directly into the rock.  The ways from here lead north, east and west.

north.description: North.  You see a ledge to something that looks like an abyss.

7113.name: The Narrow Ledge Going East To West
7113.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.

south.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7114.name: Mid-Air
7114.description: You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of CircleMUD.  The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know.  With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 meters per second squared, you are now descending the Abyss.  What awaits you at the bottom will continue to be a mystery.  Good-bye cruel world.

7115.name: The Broad Ledge
7115.description: You are standing on a ledge that seems quite a lot larger than the rest of the ledges.  This one leads to the west and the east, plus it has an exit going to the south.  Though you could jump into mid-air, but it probably wouldn't be such a good idea.  The way south is in utter darkness.

7116.name: The Northeastern Corner Of The Ledge
7116.description: You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of safe, solid ledge under your feet.  The ledge continues to the west and leads south from here into darkness.

down.description: You can just make out the outline of a trapdoor here in the soil.  The earth is probably there to conceal a secret entrance.  This looks as if it leads down into the seemingly solid rock face of the ledge.

7117.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7117.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.  And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7118.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7118.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.  And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7119.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7119.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.  And THAT is west of here so watch your step.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7120.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7120.description: You are in the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path.  There IS another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high probability of a free fall session afterwards.  And THAT is west of here so watch your step.  You also see a small opening to the east.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7121.name: The Southeastern Corner Of The Ledge
7121.description: This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to the north of here.  The ledge seems to lead around some sort of abyss of total darkness.

north.description: North of here you can see a ledge.

down.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

7122.name: Under The Pit
7122.description: You stand in a completely dark cavern leading west.  The wall looks weird here.

7123.name: Under The Shaft
7123.description: A ladder leads up from here to the Shaft.  A small opening leads west from here.

west.description: You can see a narrow ledge going north and south.

up.description: It is too dark up there.

7129.name: The Sewer Line
7129.description: You are in a narrow part of the sewer.  Down the sewer continues and to the north is the ledge.

north.description: You can see the southern part of the ledge.

down.description: You look deeper down into the drain.

7190.name: Mid-Air
7190.description: You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of CircleMUD.  The result of such a foolish act should be punished with death, you know.  With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 meters per second squared, you are now descending the Abyss.  What awaits you at the bottom will continue to be a mystery.  Good-bye cruel world.

7190.name: ring
7190.room_desc: A lovely silver ring has been left here.
